xwikidoc.name: CreatePanel
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content: <form method="post" action="$doc.getURL("view", "xpage=create")" onsubmit="cancelCancelEdit()"> <input type="hidden" value="panel" name="tocreate"/> Create new panel: <input type="text" name="title" value="Panel Title" class="panelinput" onfocus="if(this.value=='Panel Title') this.value=''" onblur="if(this.value=='') this.value='Panel Title'"/> <input type="submit" class="button" value="$msg.get("create")"/> </form>
